title: Flameria
description: James, an ordinary orphan boy, stumbles across a beautiful little girl who presents him with flowers every day. Captivated by her kindness, James feels urged to be close to her. Soon discovers that her amazing identity as a flower causes the overwhelming need to be around her. James helps this flower-girl, whom he names Flameria, travel through her whimsical land full of beauty, adventure, and danger. Their mission is to save Flameriaâ€™s wonderfully happy land from Grotessa, a girl who strives for a bleak and barren world. The story illustrates the power of imagination and the importance of being kind. It is perfect for any child or young hearted person who wants to escape to a place where imagination is everything.'
author: Carly Huss
